name: Mobbin
description: Mobbin is a comprehensive design inspiration library with over 300,000 mobile app and web UI screenshots.
introduction:
## Tool Introduction

Mobbin is an invaluable resource for UI/UX designers seeking real-world inspiration and design patterns. Its massive library showcases screenshots from over 1,000 iOS, Android, and web apps, with new content added weekly.

## Key Features

- Extensive library of 405,800 screens, 81,700 flows from 1,150 apps
- Advanced filters to quickly find specific UI patterns, elements, flows
- Insights into design patterns, copywriting, user flows from top apps
- Figma plugin to copy designs directly into Figma projects

## Suitable Use Cases

- Finding inspiration for mobile app and website UI design
- Researching standard design patterns for common UI elements
- Observing complete user flows with transitions and animations
- Shortening design process by referencing existing implementations

## User Testimonials

- "Mobbin is a game-changer for understanding UX and UI design patterns. It's massive, meticulously organized, with deep user flows and a Figma plugin!" - Meng To, DesignCode
- "Mobbin has quickly become our favorite inspiration resource for mobile apps, their advanced filtering is unmatched." - Daryl Ginn, Endless

## Usage Tips

- Use the search and advanced filters to narrow down to specific UI elements or flows
- Bookmark frequently referenced screens and flows in Collections
- Take advantage of the Figma plugin to directly copy designs into your projects
